title: Gall Hill
description: The Gall Hill Branch Library is nestled in a busy government complex of the Glebe Land, St. John. Approximately 600 yards from the historic St. John Parish Church, this library is located in the heart of a large rural district. Library services include access to EBSCO online database which contains e-books journals, newspapers and magazines, lending and reference services for adults and children, reading assistance, free computer and Internet access, and photocopying. Enjoy the very cool sea breezes from the Atlantic Ocean. Studying here is always a pleasant experience. Our regular hours are Monday to Friday 10:30 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. and 2:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m.
